resources.string: National ranking points are awarded automatically at any qualifying competitions. Standings can be found on the Archery GB website

- Tier 1: Specific National Tour shoots
- Tier 2+: Any WA 1440 or Double 720 taking place the day before or after a Tier 1 event at the same venue
- Tier 2: All open WRS head to heads
- Tier 3: All WRS WA 1440s and single or double 720s
